title: Ananda sutantiramE
sahitya:
Ananda sutantaramE en Atma nAthan aruL pUtta divya jIvanam


anupallavi

  jnAna muruval vIsi mOnam tanilE pEshi nAn enbadanai avan tAn enraNaittuk-koNDAn


caraNam    ponnil maNiyaip-pOlE tannuL enap-padittu pUraNa shaktiyaip-pozhidennuLE vasittu
munnilai ulagellAm mOkSa vIDAi madikka muktik-karumbai ennuL vaittu vaLarttu viTTAn
